alert.note: Alert for Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 8:48AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Logan, southwestern Johnson and northern Scott Counties through 915 AM CST... At 847 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mulberry to Washburn to near Morgan Springs. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Booneville... Waldron... Paris... Mansfield... Magazine... Subiaco... Hartman... Ratcliff... Beauchamp... Cardiff... Oliver... Echo... Morgan Springs... Coal Hill... Caulksville... Bates... Barber... Black Fork... Winfield... Roseville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southern Scott County; Northern Scott County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
